content.question: Marcel Duchamp displayed a urinal upside down on a pedestal

choices.label: to honor exceptional craftsmanship, engineering, and construction technique
to celebrate its aesthetic qualities, as an example of form following function
to invite the viewer to see a ready-made object in a new way
as a critique of modern capitalist consumerism

content.answer: to invite the viewer to see a ready-made object in a new way

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
